about_the_game:
This DLC pack includes the following items:
・Playable Character
Miyabi

・Mission Pack
Exclusive “Abyssal” Prequel Campaign (10 Missions)

・Hairstyle
Miyabi’s Hairstyle

・Outfits
Hebijo Uniform (Spats)
Miyabi’s Outfit
Miyabi’s Swimsuit

・2D Diorama Background
Shack in the Mountains

・3D Diorama Background
Forest of Requiem

・Pics
Miyabi Character Illustration (Burst Re:Newal)

・BGM
At Hebijo Academy
Swear to Dōgen
Hebijo Ninja Room

・Visuals
Miyabi Visual Compilation

・Voices
Miyabi Action Voice Compilation
Miyabi System Voice Compilation

Unlock 2 Top Secret Files
